diff_hunk:

         state,

         torch::cudnn::getCudnnDataType(input),
-        (THVoidTensor*)input.unsafeGetTH(false),

body: Can we please use `_var` suffixes for `at::Tensors` that are Variables? It's really hard to figure out what are the types of these things
